features: 【Make/Answer Call Bluetooth Watch】Connect your phone and this smartwatch via Bluetooth, you can answer and make clear calls directly from your smart watches for men. Recording incoming call history and contacts,then you will never miss important calls when you are driving or cooking.

【Alexa Built-in Watch & Smart Notification】This fitness tracker with Alexa voice assistant,log into Alexa in "Veryfit" app and connect this smart watch,you can check news,weather,set timers,alarm clocks or wake up other Alexa devices.This android smartwatch will also ring and vibrate when there is message notification such as Facebook,Instagram,Twitter,WhatsApp messages.

【24-Hour Health Monitor】This activity trackers and smartwatch for android ios phones supports heart rate,sleep and blood tracking,it is also a watch for women for its female-friendly design of recording period,and noticing girls the estimated one as recordings.This watch could be used as a stress tester,it estimates your stress index through your heartbeat interval,and helps you adjust your status at any time.
【100+ Sports Watch】Supporting 100+ Sports modes,this fitness watch for iphone could record your activity including calories,steps,distance,and workout time,generate reports after your exercising.

【1.8'' Full Touch HD Screen&100+ Dials Wrist Watch】This android watch for men features a 1.8'' full touch HD color screen, which provide excellent picture quality. Smart watch for iPhone compatible has 100+ dials to choose from, and you can also select your favorite photo as a dial in the watches for women.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: My smartwatch get disconnected,why ? To keep your watch connected, the app for this watch must be running in the background on your phone. The distance between the phone and this wrist watch must be within 10 meters without obstacles, as this is a bluetooth watch. Can the wristband of this smart watch be replaced? Can the wristband of this smart watch be replaced? I want to set a longer off-screen time for this alexa watch,please advise. Find Watch Settings - Display - Screen On Time. Paper instruction for this sport watch seems a bit short,why? Because we sell this sport watch globally,the manual is in six languages. More detailed English instructions for this watch can be downloaded on the front page or viewed directly in the APP. The "Device" interface in the APP has a "How to use".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best replacement for Apple Watch at this price
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great alternative to apple watch and help me to track daily steps and monitor our fitness. I can choose my own watch face and also can make phone calls. It can sync with health data. Alexa feature is nice and works very good. Step count seems good as well as sleep monitoring. It’s a very good watch in this price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick setup, great for exercise, sleep, and convenience
reviews.reviewText: Great watch for exercising, keeps track of heart rate, distance, k cal, and o2 saturation. It also tracks sleep, and has a silent vibrating alarm. It’s also water resistant and has a water drainage feature for after swimming. My favorite feature is that it connects with my phone and Alexa devices. Great value watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Comprehensive Fitness Companion: Faweio Watch Review
reviews.reviewText: The Faweio Watch has proven to be a reliable fitness tracker with an extensive range of features that cater to both health enthusiasts and tech-savvy individuals. As an avid user, here's my take on its various aspects.Fitness trackingThe Faweio Watch excels in providing all the fundamental functions of a fitness tracker. From accurately monitoring steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns to offering insights into stress levels, SpO2, and VO2 max, this watch covers all bases. The comprehensive data analysis is displayed on a vibrant and easy-to-read screen, allowing users to stay on top of their health and wellness goals.Ease of pairingPairing the Faweio Watch with my iPhone was a straightforward process, thanks to the included QR code. Simply scanning the code effortlessly established a seamless connection between the watch and my device. The user-friendly interface ensured a hassle-free setup, making it accessible even for those less familiar with technology.Smart integrationOne standout feature of the Faweio Watch is its integration with Alexa, offering hands-free convenience for various tasks. Whether checking the weather, setting reminders, or controlling smart home devices, having Alexa on the wrist adds a new layer of functionality. However, the lack of clarity regarding Spotify integration is a minor drawback. While there is a music panel, the absence of confirmation on Spotify connectivity leaves some uncertainty.Music PanelThe inclusion of a music panel on the Faweio Watch is a welcome feature for music enthusiasts. While it's unclear whether it directly integrates with Spotify, the ability to control music playback adds value for those who enjoy tunes during workouts or daily activities. The interface is intuitive, allowing for easy navigation through playlists and volume control.Overall ImpressionIn conclusion, the Faweio Watch is a commendable fitness tracker with a host of features that cater to a wide range of health and wellness needs. Its accurate tracking capabilities, easy pairing process, and smart integrations make it a solid choice for individuals seeking a comprehensive solution for their fitness journey. The slight uncertainty about Spotify integration is a minor drawback, but the overall performance and functionality of the watch make it a worthwhile investment for those prioritizing their well-being.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking smartwatch that is easy to use.Helps answering calls + stay on top with your fitness
reviews.reviewText: My husband had already a smartwatch from the same manufacturer, just an older model, so I went with the same company for my smartwatch. Very happy with fast delivery and flawless product. Display is bright and easy to read. Settings are endless. Downloaded the app Veryfit and pairing was smooth sailing. It updated right away the watch firmware, also no issues. I love the step tracker and calorie counter. I realized I was walking much less than I thought. Charging is very fast. I wish the band would be a little longer as I almost hit the last hole. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this watch it hooked up so easily. It is very well put together love it love it love it.

reviews.reviewerName: Angel At Blue Haired SudiosAngel At Blue Haired Sudios
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars EDIT 3 months later! Garbage
reviews.reviewText: ***EDIT AT BOTTOM***I use to have the Amazon halo fitness tracker! I miss it so much! But this was a decent replacement! I use a lot more of the features than I did the halo. I believe it has more features than halo. The one thing I use everyday (besides exercise options) is the sleep tracker! It shows deep and light sleep but according to the watch I never REM with that's not accurate at all. So that's one star off of my rating. That's kinda something I really wanted!I like the app it's attached to.It's attractive and helpful and reasonably priced! I would recommend and I would probably buy again (depending on how long it lasts)***EDIT: (3 months)Junk! Woke up and overnight all the options for exercising is "outdoor running" I don't even use that option! Went to settings both on the app (nothing helped)Setting on the watch only"Watch face" and "Display" the rest of the options are blank and not clickable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great and the price is wonderful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s not that great!
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it’s a great watch.I does connect to Alexa & you can make and receive phone calls. It also tracks your steps & heart rate. You can set alarms.My SMS notifications do not work nor do other notifications. However, the app says you can get notifications from all majority of social media media platforms as well.Only phone call notifications work.You can’t text or receive text messages.You can’t download apps. You cant customize the Home Screen.I will be returning for another brand. There’s no point of having a watch that you can’t customize. It’s not useful at all.

The Watch is an impressive smartwatch that seamlessly connects to your phone, enabling convenient call handling and contact management. With Alexa integration, it offers hands-free access to news, weather, and notifications from popular apps. Health tracking features include heart rate, sleep, and stress monitoring.Boasting over 100 sports modes, the fitness tracker records detailed activity metrics and generates insightful reports. The 1.8'' full-touch HD screen and 100+ dials provide a visually pleasing experience with customization options. Notably, the watch offers a remarkable 7-day battery life for daily use and is water-resistant (IP68), suitable for various activities.Compatible with iOS, it allows easy customization of settings like brightness and notifications. In summary, this smartwatch is a versatile and stylish companion for everyday life, offering a range of features in a compact and user-friendly design.

Absolutely adore my pink smartwatch! Its sleek design and pink color perfectly complement my style. The range of features, from fitness tracking to notifications, keeps me connected and motivated throughout the day. The interface is user-friendly, making it a breeze to navigate through different functions. Definitely recommend this stylish accessory for anyone looking to add both fashion and functionality to their daily routine!

reviews.reviewTitle: For the Price, it’s pretty good.
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this just before Christmas, as a gift for myself. It wouldn’t connect to my iPhone, or any of my friends androids. I got a replacement from the seller, and this one is much better already. It just arrived today, the 30th of December 2023, but it’s connected without issue. Took about 30 seconds. It runs smoothly, and so far seems to have all the features it claims.I’ll update in a few days to a week with anything new.Edit: Here’s the update. I had received a new phone as a graduation + Christmas present, and it was an android. The following feature review is from the perspective of being connected to an android phone. Although I did get it connected to my iPhone.It can receive notifications, but not text messages, if sent from an iPhone. It also cannot reply to messages. It does a decent job of tracking heart rate, and it seems to have a sleep tracking feature, but I don’t need to be informed of how bad my sleep is, so I don’t use that one. It does track my steps. Which, to be honest, is the reason I bought it in the first place. If you’re getting it out of medical necessity, getting a watch that matches your phone brand, or an actual fit bit would be in your best interest. Otherwise, this is a great cheap option.
Beautiful and no damage. Very comfortable and works well. Great deal, I am very satisfied this purchase.

I have always wanted a Smart Watch but never got around to buying one. I am very pleased with this purchase. The watch did not come with a lot of instructions but I was able to navigate the features once I downloaded the VeryFit app. The display is easy to read and navigate. I was able to sync 10 of my contacts from my iPhone to the watch. The watch notifies you of texts and messages. The phone also allows you to receive calls from your 10 programmed contacts. It is easy to program. If I can do it, anyone can. It has a lot of features such as recording sleep, activity, heart rate, oxygen level, weather, and Alexa. The battery stays charged for a number of days and is easy to charge. I would not hesitate to recommend this watch for others to buy.
